snippet.title: LEGO® DC Super-Villains Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Today, Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment, TT Games, The LEGO® Group and DC Entertainment released a NEW trailer for LEGO® DC Super-Villains ahead of its 19th October launch in the UK, showcasing the chaos of a world without super heroes. For the first time in a LEGO® game, players will be given the opportunity to unleash their inner bad guy, creating their own fully customisable super-villain character complete with their own signature super power.
